long_description: The beautifully crafted Boreas Muir Woods 30 pack hauls your gear with a comfortable, practical and durable design so you can focus on your outdoor passion instead of a sore back. This well-engineered and uncomplicated daypack offers versatility and capacity for a very full day of adventure without compromising form for function. With a suspension that rivals the comfort of bigger multiday packs, the Muir Woods 30 is a little big man that is always up for a gear-intensive hike or long day of cragging. Supportive hipbelt and shoulder straps distribute pressure evenly with resilient foam that maintains its volume, even under a heavy load. Back panel features a Z-foam surface that pumps air as you hike to help keep your back cool; aluminum hoop frame effectively transfers load weight to your hips. Panel-loading main compartment opens wide and lies completely flat, making it easy to stow and access your gear. Tuck-away daisy chains and a minimal number of zippers, buckles and straps create a clean and streamlined profile. Light, 210-denier ripstop nylon is impregnated with silicone for water-resistant durability; 410-denier nylon base is just plain tough. The Boreas Muir Woods 30 pack features a hydration sleeve and port (reservoir sold separately), expandable exterior stretch pocket and zippered top and hipbelt pockets.
short_description: The beautifully crafted Boreas Muir Woods 30 pack hauls your gear with a comfortable, practical and durable design so you can focus on your outdoor passion instead of a sore back.
